divs: sighting detailson monday the 5th of july i stepped outside to take some pictures of the sun setting on my cell phone (blackberry)as i always do. i took several pictures but didnt have the change to review them til the next day.the next day i went through each one and noticed that the clouds had form a face of a person pointing up so i looked up and there was a ufo. i reviewed the previous picture before that one and noticed four ufos. they look like their are in some kind of formation. three of the four are aline like the pyramids or like alintak,alrilam and mintaka the three stars of orion constellation> the face of the clouds looks mad but and is still piontting up towards the ufos. the sun is behind some clouds and it looks like another face . people that ive should the pictures and pionted out the images have freaked out. i dont want to send them this way however you can contact by cell [number deleted\cms\tg]
